title: Trying to Recreate
content:
Trying to recreate this logo which is very pixelated. Any guesses on the font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425083209im_/http:/typophile.com/files/25Years_5652.jpg)
author: jah29

comments.content: It's Poster Bodoni Black. The inner section of the 5 seems altered and flat as opposed to an inward curve.
